text: Steven J. Ricchetti is an American political aide and lobbyist. On November 17, 2020 he was hired to be the Counselor to the President under President- elect Joe Biden. He was Chief of Staff to Vice President Joe Biden during the Obama administration and Deputy Chief of Staff for Operations under President Bill Clinton. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Ohio Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Ricchetti
